articles.title: Why New York State Is Experiencing a Bitcoin Boom

articles.title: El Salvador plans 'Bitcoin City' - Reuters
articles.description: After becoming the first country to accept the cryptocurrency as legal tender, El Salvador plans to build the world's first Bitcoin City, funded initially by bitcoin-backed bonds.

Posted 
After becoming the first country to accept the cryptocurrency as legal tender, El Salvador plans to build the world's first Bitcoin City, funded initially by bitcoin-backed bonds.
